user.title: Tautulli Active Streams
user.description:
To find your API key, open the Tautulli webpage and navigate to **Settings** â†’ **Web Interface**. The API key is at the bottom of that page.

**Examples of URL formats:**
- **Local (HTTP)**: `http://192.168.0.10:8181`
- **Remote / Reverse Proxy (HTTPS)**: `https://tautulli.example.com`

If using HTTPS (SSL), ensure that your certificate is valid or disable SSL verification below.

data.url: Enter the full URL of your Tautulli server (e.g., http://192.168.0.10:8181).

data.image_proxy: Use Image Proxy? (Check to proxy images via Home Assistant)
data.advanced_attributes: Enable Extra Attributes? (Include additional session attributes)
